column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Katara says : " I 'm sorry I yelled at you before . "
#Text=Zuko says : " It does n't matter . "
#Text=Katara says : " It 's just that for so long now , whenever I would imagine the face of the enemy , it was your face . "
#Text=Zuko says : " My face ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " It 's okay .
#Text=I used to think this scar marked me .
#Text=The mark of the banished prince , cursed to chase the Avatar forever .
#Text=But lately , I 've realized I 'm free to determine my own destiny , even if I 'll never be free of my mark .
#Text=" Katara says : " Maybe you could be free of it .
#Text=" Zuko says : " What ?
#Text=" Katara says : " I have healing abilities .
#Text=" Zuko says : " It 's a scar , it ca n't be healed .
#Text=" Katara says : " This is water from the Spirit Oasis at the North Pole .
#Text=It has special properties , so I 've been saving it for something important .
#Text=I do n't know if it would work , but ... " Katara says : " Aang !
#Text=" Katara says : " Aang , I knew you would come .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Uncle , I do n't understand .
#Text=What are you doing with the Avatar ?
#Text=" Aang says : " Saving you , that 's what .
#Text=" Iroh says : " Zuko , it 's time we talked .
#Text=Go help you other friends .
#Text=We 'll catch up with you .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Why , Uncle ?
#Text=" Iroh says : " You 're not the man you used to be , Zuko .
#Text=You are stronger and wiser and freer than you have ever been .
#Text=And now you have come to the crossroads of your destiny .
#Text=It 's time for you to choose .
#Text=It 's time for you to choose good .
#Text=" Azula says : " I expected this kind of treachery from Uncle .
#Text=But Zuko , Prince Zuko , you 're a lot of things , but you 're not a traitor , are you ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " Release him immediately .
#Text=" Azula says : " It 's not too late for you , Zuko .
#Text=You can still redeem yourself .
#Text=" Iroh says : " The kind of redemption she offers is not for you .
#Text=" Azula says : " Why do n't you let him decide , Uncle ?
#Text=I need you , Zuko .
#Text=I 've plotted every move of this day , this glorious day in Fire Nation history , and the only way we win is together .
#Text=At the end of this day , you will have your honor back .
#Text=You will have Father 's love .
#Text=You will have everything you want .
#Text=" Iroh says : " Zuko , I am begging you .
#Text=Look into your heart and see what it is that you truly want .
#Text=" Azula says : " You are free to choose .
#Text=" Katara says : " We 've got to find Sokka and Toph .
#Text="
